objects.specification: A wide smooth showroom floor surface with a lightly reflective polished tile finish in a neutral light gray tone, providing a clean and spacious base for the booth.
A tall straight wall panel with a smooth metallic silver finish and subtle matte texture, standing three units high with a thin profile to form part of the booth perimeter.
A tall straight wall panel with a smooth metallic silver finish and subtle matte texture, standing three units high with a thin profile to form part of the booth perimeter.
A tall straight wall panel with a smooth metallic silver finish and subtle matte texture, standing three units high with a thin profile to form part of the booth perimeter.

A sleek modern demo car model with aerodynamic sculpted body lines, a glossy vibrant red paint finish, tinted windows, detailed chrome wheels and low-profile tires, designed to draw visitor attention.
A large rectangular welcome desk with a dark gray matte finish base, rounded edges, and a smooth polished countertop for registration and visitor interaction.
A tall vertical banner featuring high-resolution car-themed graphics, printed on a durable textile with vibrant blue accent tones, mounted on a slim metallic pole.
A tall vertical banner featuring high-resolution car-themed graphics, printed on a durable textile with vibrant blue accent tones, mounted on a slim metallic pole.
A small standing podium with a dark base and an angled clear acrylic information panel on top, designed to display car specifications and features.
A small standing podium with a dark base and an angled clear acrylic information panel on top, designed to display car specifications and features.
A small standing podium with a dark base and an angled clear acrylic information panel on top, designed to display car specifications and features.

A sleek suspended cylindrical spotlight with polished metal housing, casting a focused downward beam to highlight the demo car surface.

A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage and a modern ceramic pot, placed for visual accent in the booth corner.
